title: Language Education Design and Operational Strategies Utilizing Technology-Enhanced Active Learning (TEAL)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device utilization skills and secondary-level language proficiency
context.additional_context: Targeting corporate managers/leaders, aims to improve language proficiency applicable to real work environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform collaborative learning with peers at over 80% engagement in TEAL environments
Learners can demonstrate a 30% improvement in language proficiency through formative assessments
Learners can analyze TEAL-style challenges and apply over three improvement strategies to their own instructional designs
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
